cast.name: 伊利亚·理查森 Elijah Richardson
以利亚·李察森 Elijah Richardson

this_title: Elijah Richardson: Trust Your WILD Side
introduction: Dive into the WILD world of Elijah Richardson in his Trust Your WILD Side documentary. As the inaugural film of Season 2, this captivating story reveals Elijah's unwavering passion for the environment. Experience his film and learn about crucial environmental issues such as plastic pollution, ocean conservation, and coral reef protection.Trust Your WILD Side educates and inspires viewers to embrace their role in safeguarding our planet. Join Elijah as he champions the cause for a cleaner, greener world and discover the WILD side of environmental activism.
chinese_title: Elijah Richardson: Trust Your WILD Side
